description:
Business deregistrations

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
52311 Statistics of business notifications

Definition:
Business deregistrations are considered as business
notifications, as are business modifications and business
registrations.
The notification obligation applies to independent
businesses, branch establishments and dependent branch
offices.
A business deregistration is required when a business has
entirely or partially ceased, a business is transferred
(sale, lease or succession), a partner leaves the business,
the legal status is modified, the business is transferred to
another district, or a business has ceased in accordance
with the Transformation Act.
Since reference year 2003, partial cessation has no longer
been included.


© Statistisches Bundesamt, Wiesbaden 2017
name: Business deregistrations
